title: d!nk Publication Structure
description: The json structure of data created by the d!nk Powerpoint plugin

previous.description: Determines if user can go back to previous page by sliding

next.description: Determines if user can go to next page by sliding

portrait.description: Determines if component is visible in portrait mode

landscape.description: Determines if component is visible in landscape mode

userData.description: User data, used by dynamicValue to know the path of the component

propertyEnabled.description: structure often used to disable/enable property

storyLinkData.description: structure used to provide data for story links

story.description: the page the user wants to open, can be an identifier or a special string. Forward/Back means go to the next/previous page in your history

gradientData.description: structure used to provide data for gradient

type.description: the type of gradient, only linear for now

colors.description: the color stops of the gradient

selectedForegroundColor.description: the color of the selected value

selectedBackgroundColor.description: the background color of the selected value

handlerHeight.description: the height of slider's handler in pixels

handlerOffsetTop.description: the offset top of the slider's handler

src.description: the url we need to open
the source of the pdf document

refresh_target.description: page to show after the publication has been refreshed

timer.description: a timer starts counting when there is no activity

milli.description: number of milliseconds after which to refresh, used by timer

publicationName.description: the name of the publication the user wants to open

story.description: the page that should be shown when opening the publication

kioskName.description: the name of the kiosk the user wants to open

files.description: the name of pdf files you can select

signature.description: signature component, using a canvas to allow users to sign a publication

buttonLabel.description: the label appearing on the button that can be used to clear the signature canvas

buttonPosition.description: the position of the button - relative to the canvas - that can be used to clear the signature canvas

graphicSelect.description: graphicSelect component a.k.a. select hotzone, equivalent of html area element

areas.description: specific zones/areas that can be clicked

top.description: y-position relative to the hotzone magjet

left.description: x-position relative to the hotzone magjet

value.description: the value associated with this specific zone

radius.description: radius of the circle, if 2 values are given they will determine the width and height of an ellipse

singleAnswer.description: determines if the answer should be just one item

mail.description: @deprecated. Mail component, now moved to submit button configuration

enterprise.description: key of the enterprise in data store

spreadsheet.description: key of the Google Drive spreadsheet

spreadsheetOutput.description: key of the Google Drive spreadsheet to which to write updates

displayColumn.description: field shown as label in dropdown

useHistory.description: determines if data should be stored for offline usage

showWarning.description: show warning when new data is available

selectColumn.description: fields and values that are used to build a query retrieving specific results

enterprise.description: key of the enterprise in data store

spreadsheet.description: key of the Google Drive spreadsheet

columns.description: columns and their values to be used for a new record/row in a spreadsheet

input.description: input component a.k.a. open question magjet

default.description: the default answer to the question

column.description: the column/field value from the dynamicValue spreadsheet that should be displayed in this input field

inputValidator.description: inputValidator component maps to userinputvalidator magjet

inputCollector.description: inputCollector component maps to userinputcollector magjet

isReadOnly.description: means the field values cannot be changed by the user when viewing the publication

sending.description: message to display while sending data

anyOf.description: single email address, can also be an empty string

cc.description: recipients in cc of the mail

anyOf.description: single email address, can also be an empty string

path.description: @TODO: find out what this is about

image.description: the poster image aka placeholder for this video

type.description: determines how the options should be displayed

sheetInfo.description: optional property that retrieves available options from a spreadsheet

column.description: the column/field values from the dynamicValue spreadsheet that should be displayed as options

function.description: mathematical expression used to be calculated. ex: A * B

inputs.description: key value object which maps the variable in the function to be replaced with the corresponding path

input.description: the path of the field used as input for the converter

default.description: default key of value used when there is no value from input

range.description: if true, the interval between one key and other will also shown a value

values.description: key value object which maps the input value to a string for display purposes

dragItem.description: dragItem is part of dragAndDrop magjet

src.description: the url of a image if necessary

tagColor.description: the color of the tag of a dragItem

dropZone.description: dropZone is part of dragAndDrop magjet

aspectRatio.description: The aspect ratio of the publication
